item.title: Why Hot Water Freezes Faster
item.description: Why Hot Water Freezes Faster The boiling water trick will work at much higher temperatures than -50C. If you were to pour the water out, it wouldn’t freeze, but because they throw it into a bunch of individual droplets it freezes much faster.

item.title: Why Keeping the Room Cool Helps Sleep
item.description: Why Keeping the Room Cool Helps Sleep There are times during the night that you are paralyzed ([[REM Sleep]]) but also times you can move.
